directions: Harvest the sugar cane stalks when they are fully grown.
Remove the leaves and outer layers of the sugar cane.
Extract the sugar cane juice by crushing the stalks.
Filter the juice to remove any impurities.
Boil the juice until it thickens and the water evaporates, leaving behind a thick syrup.
Allow the syrup to cool and crystallize.
Once crystallized, grind the sugar crystals into a fine powder.
Store the sugar in an airtight container.
